QuestData.Title: Into the Prison
QuestData.Description: Da Twilight's Hammer be here for some reason. We don't know why, but Thal'trak be lettin' you in on a lil' secret of ours - da rogue Lexlort waits outside da hall where High Interrogator Gerstahn be so he can kill her if he gets da chance.$B$BShe's too smart for dat, though, so you gonna go in an' do it, ya? Go talk to Lexlort and let him know. I'm sure he be ok with it.
